articles.description: Ex-Team India captain Virat Kohli will take a break from cricket and will stay back in London after the conclusion of the ongoing series against England, as per reports.
articles.content:
Ex-Team India captain Virat Kohli will take a break from cricket and will stay back in London after the conclusion of the ongoing series against England, as per reports.
